scripts.chromatic: # do nothing as we don't want Chromatic project token in here
scripts.test-storybook:ci: concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "http-server storybook-static -s --port 6006" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6006 && test-storybook --url http://127.0.0.1:6006 --coverage --junit"
scripts.test-storybook:retest: wait 3000 && echo Starting Storybook tests... && (test-storybook --url http://127.0.0.1:6020 --coverage || true) && echo Completed Storybook tests...
scripts.test-storybook:watch: concurrently --names "HTTP,TEST" --hide HTTP --prefix-colors "blue,magenta" "storybook dev --no-open -p 6020" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6020 && wait 30000 && onchange -i -k src/**/* -- npm run test-storybook:retest"
scripts.test-storybook-a11y:retest: wait 3000 && echo Starting Storybook A11Y tests... && ((axe-storybook --storybook-url http://127.0.0.1:6020) || true) && echo Completed Storybook A11Y tests...
scripts.test-storybook-a11y:watch: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6020 && wait 30000 && onchange -i -k src/**/* -- npm run test-storybook-a11y:retest
